tutorial.text: Click here to choose a game mode and start a part.
Check your daily, weekly, and special quests here to earn rewards.
Access to your inventory to see the objects you've collected
Drag this bar down to see your detailed stats.
Slide it up to pull it up. Try it now !

classique.title: Classic game mode
classique.text: Face opponents in balanced fights. The objective is to put health points of your opponent to 0.

survie.title: Survival game mode
survie.text: Test your endurance ! Face waves of increasingly powerful opponents. How many rounds will you be able to survive ?

classique-weeknd.title: Classic weekend mode
classique-weeknd.text: A special game mode who is only available in weekend ! Enjoy unique bonuses and more rewards. The basic rules are the same as the classic game mode.

connectionStatus.offline: Offline - Failure to connect to the server.

character_selection.title: Choose a character
character_selection.locked_message: This character is not unlocked yet!

server_logs.potion_use: You use a Health Potion and recover 1100 HP.
server_logs.amulet_equip: You equip the Amulet of Regeneration.
server_logs.sword_use: You use a Sharp Sword (+5% Attack).
server_logs.elixir_use: You drink a Power Elixir (+50 Attack).
server_logs.armor_use: You use an Iron Armor. Opponent's attack is reduced by 10%.
server_logs.shield_equip: You equip a Solid Shield (+15 Defense).
server_logs.crystal_use: You use a Renewal Crystal (+80% Special).
server_logs.missed_cape: {name} misses because of the Shadow Cape!
server_logs.attack_guaranteed_crit_player: Thanks to the Mantle of Vengeance, you land a guaranteed critical hit! You deal {damage} damage to {defender}.
server_logs.attack_crit_player: You attack and land a critical hit! You deal {damage} damage to {defender}.
server_logs.attack_normal_player: You attack and deal {damage} damage to {defender}.
server_logs.attack_guaranteed_crit_opponent: Thanks to the Mantle of Vengeance, {attacker} lands a guaranteed critical hit! They deal {damage} damage.
server_logs.attack_crit_opponent: {attacker} attacks and lands a critical hit! They deal {damage} damage.
server_logs.special_countered: {name} uses their special ability but {opponent} anticipates and counters it!
server_logs.already_defended: {name} already defended against your last attack!

abilities.Diva: {attacker} uses special ability! {defender}'s attack is reduced to {stat_val} for 3 turns, and takes {damage} damage.
abilities.Willy: {attacker} uses special ability and deals a total of {damage} damage in three hits!
abilities.Baleine: Baleine uses special ability! He gains 1000 HP! And deals {damage} damage.
abilities.Doudou: {attacker} uses special ability! She regenerates {regen} HP. And deals {damage} damage.
abilities.Coeur: {attacker} uses special ability! He deals {damage} damage and recovers {heal} HP.
abilities.Grours: {attacker} uses special ability! He deals {damage} damage to {defender}, ignoring shield.
abilities.Poulpy: {attacker} uses special ability! It deals {damage} damage to {defender}, ignores 40% defense and reduces defense by 15% for 3 turns.
abilities.Oiseau: {attacker} uses special ability! It deals {damage} damage and gains 20 defense for 2 turns.
abilities.Colorina: {attacker} uses special ability! It deals {damage} damage and reduces {defender}'s defense by 15% for 4 turns.
abilities.Rosalie_normal: {attacker} uses special ability! She deals {damage} damage.
abilities.Rosalie_immobilize: {attacker} uses special ability! She deals {damage} damage and immobilizes {defender} for one turn.
abilities.Sboonie: {attacker} uses special ability! It regenerates {regen} HP, deals 50 damage and reduces {defender}'s attack by 15% for 2 turns.
abilities.Inconnu: {attacker} uses special ability, increases attack and defense by 25 for 3 turns and {defender} cannot use special ability for {turns} turns! And deals {damage} damage.
abilities.Boompy: {attacker} activates Unstable Overload! Defense is reduced but attacks can be devastating for 2 turns.
abilities.Perro: {attacker} uses special ability, deals {damage} damage and reduces {defender}'s defense by 30% for 3 turns!
abilities.Nautilus: {attacker} uses special ability, deals a total of {damage} damage.
abilities.Paradoxe_assaut: {attacker} switches to Assault Stance! Attack increases by 40% and defense is reduced by 50% for 2 turns.
abilities.Paradoxe_garde: {attacker} switches to Guard Stance! Defense increases by 60% and attack is reduced by 30% for 2 turns.
abilities.Korb: {attacker} sharpens his dagger! He deals {damage} damage and increases critical chance.
abilities.Default: {attacker} uses special ability! It deals {damage} damage.

spell_descriptions.Willy: Unleashes a flurry of three consecutive attacks on the opponent.
spell_descriptions.Cocobi: Deals true damage equal to 12% of the opponent's maximum health.
spell_descriptions.Oiseau: Dives onto the opponent, dealing 250% of attack damage and increasing own defense by 20 points.
spell_descriptions.Grours: Strikes with colossal force, dealing 500 damage plus attack damage, ignoring 50% of enemy defense.
spell_descriptions.Baleine: Sacrifices 15 defense points to heal 1000 HP while attacking. Cannot be used if defense is too low.
spell_descriptions.Doudou: Regenerates 5% of current HP (or 15% if HP is low), then follows up with an attack.
spell_descriptions.Coeur: Launches a vampiric attack dealing 150% of attack damage and restoring 10% to 15% of damage dealt as HP.
spell_descriptions.Diva: Charms the opponent, reducing their attack by 25% for 3 turns and dealing damage.
spell_descriptions.Poulpy: Delivers a brutal attack dealing 175% damage, ignoring 50% of enemy defense and reducing it by 15% for subsequent turns.
spell_descriptions.Colorina: Launches a debilitating attack dealing 85% damage and reducing opponent's defense by 15% for 3 turns.
spell_descriptions.Rosalie: Unleashes a powerful attack dealing 200% damage, with a 25% chance to immobilize the opponent for one turn.
spell_descriptions.Sboonie: Releases an energy wave restoring 8% max HP, dealing 50 damage and reducing enemy attack by 15% for the next turn.
spell_descriptions.Inconnu: Locks the opponent's special ability for 3 turns, increases own attack and defense by 25 points, and deals damage.
spell_descriptions.Boompy: Activates Unstable Overload for 2 turns. Attacks have a 40% chance to deal 175% damage, but defense is reduced by 30%. Requires 3 attacks to charge.
spell_descriptions.Perro: Bites the opponent, dealing damage and reducing their defense by 30% for 2 turns.
spell_descriptions.Nautilus: Performs a series of 3 rapid strikes, each dealing 60% of attack damage. Each hit has a 50% chance to reduce enemy defense by 10 points.
spell_descriptions.Paradoxe: Paradoxical Inversion: Switches between two stances. **Assault Stance:** Increases attack by 40% but reduces defense by 50% for 2 turns. **Guard Stance:** Increases defense by 60% but reduces attack by 30% for 2 turns.
spell_descriptions.Korb: Sharpens dagger, dealing 75% of attack damage and increasing critical hit chance by 15% for the next turn.

perso_stats.title: Characters
perso_stats.modal_desc: Mastery represents your skill with a character. It is divided into Levels and Grades.
perso_stats.modal_levels_desc: Each character progresses through multiple mastery levels, unlocking rewards and proving your expertise. The order is as follows:
perso_stats.modal_grades_desc: Within each level, you must climb several grades. Each grade requires a certain amount of mastery points, earned by playing with the character. The order is as follows:

errors.limit_reached: You have reached the purchase limit for this offer.

xp_2.title: Double XP
xp_2.desc: Enjoy double XP during your fights!

amulette.title: Regeneration Amulet
amulette.desc: Regenerates 2% of max HP per turn.

cape.title: Shadow Cape
cape.desc: Ignores damage taken from the next attack.

marque_chasseur.title: Hunter's Mark
marque_chasseur.desc: Guarantees your next attack is a critical hit.

purge_spirituelle.title: Spiritual Purge
purge_spirituelle.desc: Dispels all negative effects affecting you.

orbe_siphon.title: Siphon Orb
orbe_siphon.desc: Reduces opponent's special energy gain by 50% for 3 turns.

chest_attack.title: Attack
chest_attack.desc: Contains an Attack equipment of random rarity.

chest_defense.title: Defense
chest_defense.desc: Contains a Defense equipment of random rarity.

chest_agility.title: Agility
chest_agility.desc: Contains an Agility equipment of random rarity.

chest_balance.title: Balance
chest_balance.desc: Contains a Balance equipment of random rarity.
